org.naomi.regex

Interface AlterationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackReferencePattern, BoundaryPattern, BuiltInCharClass, CharClass, CharSequencePattern, CollectionCharClass, ComplementCharClass, ConcatenatePattern, DateTime, DelegateCharClass, EnumPattern, ExplicitCharClass, FilterCharClass, GlobPattern, IntersectCharClass, IntervalCharClass, OrPattern, Pattern, RegExpPattern, UnionCharClass

    public interface AlterationListener
    The listener interface for receiving notifications of changes in an instance of Pattern that might affect which Strings it matches.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlterationListener altered(Pattern src)
      This should be called when any change is made or occurs which might affect which strings this Pattern matches.

    • Method Detail

      • altered

        AlterationListener altered(Pattern src)
        This should be called when any change is made or occurs which might affect which strings this Pattern matches. It is called automatically whenever any method or subclass method whose name begins with "set", is called. When it is called, any data that have been cached for efficiency will be removed.
        Parameters:
        src - The instance of Pattern whose alteration might have affected which strings it matches.
